HeroWrapper.aboutTheHero: A web developer who loves turning ideas into reality through code. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React, and I’m expanding my expertise in back-end technologies like Node.js, Express, and MongoDB . I love exploring new tools and techniques to build efficient and engaging digital products. I’m always excited to learn new things and work with others to bring great projects to life.

Circle.circleInfo: Driven by a love for coding, I have taken the initiative to improve my knowledge in web development through online courses and personal projects. My focus is on building practical, real-world applications and growing as a developer every step of the way.

DevelopmentJourney.title: My Journey into Full-Stack Development
DevelopmentJourney.description1: For the past three years, I have been intensively studying web development. Currently, I am focused on using Node.js along with technologies like Express and MongoDB to build back-end applications. Since mastering both front-end and back-end development is important to me, I aim to enhance my skills on both sides to become a well-rounded full-stack developer.
DevelopmentJourney.description2: My passion for coding drives me to constantly learn and improve. I believe that the ability to solve real-world problems through technology is one of the most rewarding aspects of being a developer. Whether it’s creating sleek, responsive user interfaces or designing scalable server-side solutions, I am always ready for new challenges and opportunities to grow.
